competitors.name: Apache Kafka
competitors.notes: Open-source project, Confluent founders created Kafka at LinkedIn

context: In 2015, Confluent was founded by Apache Kafka creators from LinkedIn. The company raised $24M Series A to build commercial Kafka platform. Apache Kafka was gaining adoption for real-time data streaming in enterprises. Traditional message queuing systems like RabbitMQ and ActiveMQ were established competitors. Amazon Kinesis represented cloud-native streaming alternative. The real-time data streaming market was nascent but growing rapidly with IoT and digital transformation.
